description: Alexa Von Tess Live, Part 2The second half of Alexa's live show had Alexa and Delilah Strong bound to posts facing each other with a tight chains running through their crotches and over a loop connecting them to each other, ensuring any violent motion by one girl would be felt by the other in the most intimately painful manner. The girls try to hold still, but a cattle prod set on high breaks their composure immediately.
title: Alexa Von Tess Live, Part 2
